text:
The weather has been interesting for many of us this winter. Brutally cold winds forced Taylor Swift to pile on the layers while supporting her boyfriend Travis Kelce at the Kansas City Chiefs game against the Miami Dolphins this past weekend. Meanwhile, strong Santa Ana winds forced Golden Globe winner Ali Wong to wear a wind-proof hairstyle for the big night.
With the weather so unpredictable, we are opting to spend more time indoors to steer clear of the plunging temperatures. Whether or not that means turning into a couch potato to binge the latest shows or indulging in at-home spa treatments, staying cozy is a must. Hooded robes are a helpful addition to ensure that you are warm and comfortable no matter what the weather is like outdoors.
